page.title: 11SECTION 4 - POOLEY BRIDGE
page.content: SOCIAL CONCERN - Of concern to many people in the village that a quarter of the houses & five sixth of the shops are only open in the summer months. Will the village become an extension of the caravan sites? LAND COVER - 0l - Residential; 83 houses, 3 hotels, l caravan & camping site, 3 guest houses. 02 - Commercial: 5 shops, Agricultural Chemical Distributor. 05 - Road through the village is the bus route from Penrith to Patterdale B5320. Road to Howtown & Martindale runs to the east of the village and the village High Street connects the two. l2 - Farm land rough grazing, hay, silage. Abandoned quarry where stone for the bridge was obtained in l764. l9 river Eamont flows from Ullswater through this area and joins the river Eden.
